featured.text: Applicants should meet the requirements: Interested candidates please apply immediately with (1) Taiwan citizen resume and mail to P.O. box 594.
Fax resume and work samples, if any, to The China Post at (03) 2595-7962.

definition.zh_def: 簡歷，通常用於求職時，概述個人的教育背景、工作經驗和技能。
definition.en_def: A document that summarizes a person's education, work experience, and skills, typically used when applying for jobs.
definition.example: She updated her resume before applying for the new job.
